name: A Lymphocyte's Purpose 一个淋巴细胞的使命
name_original: A Lymphocyte's Purpose 一个淋巴细胞的使命
description:
The body has been infected by coronavirus. You are a lymphocyte soldier whose dream is to destroy all the coronavirus to save the whole body. You are selected as “Metamorphosis Plan” Your DNA has been edited so that you are more powerful to defeat the dreadful coronavirus.

Move the character around by left click. Sprint by right click. Avoid being attacked by the coronavirus enemies because you only have 3 health initially.  You can collect ATP and Nutrition for obtaining energy and shield respectively, which will be shown on the top-left corner. Energy is the cost for releasing skills, while the shield is for protecting the player from damage. Additionally,  with a shield, you can also damage the enemy by sprinting toward the enemy. After killing enemies, random items will be dropped. Some skills may also be unlocked! Explore the whole world, enhance yourself and try to kill the coronavirus Boss!

B站中文视频链接: https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV11K4y1o7rr/

你是一个带有拯救被新冠病毒侵害身体的使命的淋巴细胞。玩家可以通过鼠标左键移动角色，通过鼠标右键向前冲刺。玩家可以收集地图中的ATP和营养物质，ATP可以增加能量值(用于释放技能)，营养物质可以为玩家提供护盾以抵挡敌人伤害。玩家向敌人冲刺时如果带有护盾则可以对敌人造成伤害。通过击杀敌人，玩家可以获得随机道具，还可能解锁新技能。探索这个细胞内环境，提升角色能力来击败最终新冠病毒Boss吧。
